full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 743 Filed 08/10/22 Page 52 of 247 180 LBUVMAX2 Visoski - direct 1 Q. Did anyone ever tell you how old Jane was? 2 A. No. 3 Q. Do you know how old Jane was when you met her? 4 A. No, I didn't. 5 Q. How did you meet Jane? 6 A. Mr. Epstein brought her to the cockpit and introduced her to me. 7 8 Q. What, if anything, stands out in your mind about Jane's demeanor when you met her that day? 9 10 A. Just a mature woman with some piercing powder blue eyes. 11 Q. About how many times do you recall seeing Jane on 12 Mr. Epstein's plane? 13 A. At least one, the time that Mr. Epstein introduced. 14 Q. Do you remember where you were going that day? 15 A. I do not. 16 Q. Do you remember where you were coming from? 17 A. Yes. 18 Q. Do you remember where you were coming from that day? 19 A. Yes, we were departing West Palm Beach Airport. 20 Q. What, if any, passenger with the first name Virginia do you remember flying on Mr. Epstein's plane? 21 22 A. I do remember at least one person named Virginia. 23 Q. And what was that person's full name? 24 A. It was Virginia Roberts. 25 Q. About when did you meet Virginia Roberts? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00017414

And what was that person's full name? 24 A. It was Virginia Roberts. 25 Q. About when did you meet Virginia Roberts?
